document_data.mainbody:
neem was a goblin sharp-eye that pledged his allegiance to the Cult of the Absolute in the late 15 century DR.
Sneem had hay-colored hair he gathered in a ponytail, and his face bore smudges of war paint. The goblin wore roughly-stitched leathers and was armed with a goblin shortbow.
In the , Sneem became indoctrinated into the worship of the Absolute, and he joined the cultist army led by the drow paladin named Minthara Baenre. Along with other humanoids of the army, Sneem stayed in the ruined temple of Sel√ªne in the Western Heartlands and later participated in an attack on the nearby Emerald Grove that sheltered a group of tiefling refugees from Elturel. The outcome of the conflict and Sneems fate remained unrecorded.
